text: enṟe janaṅṅaḷē, bhūmiyil mikaccunilkkunnavar enna nilayil inn ādhipatyaṁ niṅṅaḷkk tanne. ennāl allāhuvinṟe śikṣa namukk vannāl atil ninn nam'me rakṣiccu sahāyikkān āruṇṭ‌? phir'aun paṟaññu: ñān (śariyāyi) kāṇunna mārgaṁ mātramāṇ ñān niṅṅaḷkk kāṇiccutarunnat‌. śariyāya mārgattilēkkallāte ñān niṅṅaḷe nayikkukayilla
